description:
Zyrtec hayfever and allergy cetrizine rapid acting relief tablets relieves hayfever & allergy symptoms.

Zyrtec Cetirizine Rapid Acting Relief is an allergy & hayfever tablet that relieves hayfever & allergy symptoms. Zyrtec hayfever and allergy tablets are rapid acting and provide relief for 24 hours.

Relieves hayfever & allergy symptoms, includin

  • Sneezing
  • Runny nose
  • Watery/itchy eyes
  • Hives and itchy skin rash

Zyrtec Cetirizine Rapid Acting Hayfever & Allergy Relief tablets are small and easy to swallow. The active ingredient, cetirizine, helps to block the production of histamine to reduce symptoms of hayfever and allergy.

24 Hour Relief

Allergy & Hayfever Tablets

10 Pack

Rapid Acting?

Antihistamine
name: Zyrtec Rapid Acting Allergy & Hayfever Antihistamine Tablets 10 Pack
